text: @afneil Think if you ask Boffins you may find their answer will be UK has #COVID19 so if people come from Country with #coronavirus, no +/-. That's the type advice Govt appears to be following. Can interact into Society if you fly 000s miles but not in next street. #scary

entity.description: BBC journalist and broadcaster, chairman of Press Holdings Media Group, whose titles include The Spectator, and the ITP Media Group.
